subject: fix: resolve null metadata crash on dashboard load
body:
Global state sync ran after useMemo hooks that depend on it, causing
getAuthorEmail/getAuthorName to read null globalState.data.metadata
when LOAD_DATA triggered a re-render. Moved sync before hooks and
added defensive optional chaining as safety net.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01VdNhbijTAneNuV1vhiNbqL
title: resolve null metadata crash on dashboard load
